text: It's not wrong to ask for details pero naipon yung frustration mo sa senseless comments tapos nilabas mo doon sa mga comments na may sense naman. That's why you're getting downvoted, because you're carrying over the attitude of the senseless comments to the commenters who are legitimately answering your question. Kaya from the outside looking in, magtataka mga tao dito na bakit ka naggalit eh sinasagot naman yung tanong mo ng maayos.
Of course no holds barred dapat ang laban 😁 bawal lang manusok ng mata, mang-kagat, at mang-bayag mala UFC 1 rules
